subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey’s injury exposes the fraility of ligaments and tendons, already stretched by the pitching motion. As a biomedical engineer says, “Velocity itself is a risk factor for injury.”
snippet: Matt Harvey’s injury exposes the fraility of ligaments and tendons, already stretched by the pitching motion. As a biomedical engineer says, “Velocity itself is a risk factor for injury.”
